meanings.definition: A person or company that sells goods.
meanings.sent1: The vender at the market had a variety of fresh fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: I bought this toy from a vender on the street.
meanings.sent3: The vender accidentally gave me two apples instead of one!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the vender's stall at the fair.
meanings.sent5: The vender's colorful display caught the attention of many passersby.

meanings.sent1: She decided to vender her handmade jewelry at the craft fair.
meanings.sent2: The shop owner venders various items to customers every day.
meanings.sent3: I will vender my old clothes to make some extra money.
meanings.sent4: His persuasive skills can vender anything to anyone.
meanings.sent5: The street performer venders his CDs after his show.
